name: This is room #9 facing street and front deck view
neighborhood_overview: Train, pond,parks,zoo,few stop train new casino encore plus downtown Boston north end medical area Fenway park etc last aquarium
description:
Over here you have 2 grills to cook a nice deck outside with fire pit plus a private vip deck upstairs also garden with chairs to relax or read also a hammock to relax etc

The space
First of all it’s upstairs you need to climb stairs .. I’m directly across the brewery and train station is only 5 minute walk or a block away lots places to eat rest bar also liquor store block away bike rental and zip car block away lots more very safe neighborhood

Other things to note
Well my mom is 72 and she loves her music and her coorslight beer she usually around property with her little radio but not bothering no one but she is friendly if you want chill lol

License number
Str-429149
